title: Chapter 1849 - I Can’T Wait
body:
Chapter 1849 - I Can’T Wait

Without the slightest hesitation, Su Yi decided to visit the Central Plain Spirit Province’s Cloudsoar Peak in three months.

It didn’t matter if it was a conspiracy or if the mountain was covered in layers of death traps. There was absolutely no way that Su Yi would let his enemies lay their dirty fingers on the authority of the Central Immortal Court.

They weren’t worthy!

......

After draining his cup and sampling all his dishes, Su Yi got up, and he was just about to go on a stroll when he suddenly had a premonition. Qing Wu had arrived!

He returned to his seat and waited in silence. Before long, Qing Wu had appeared in front of him.

“You sure know how to enjoy yourself, Fellow Daoist.” Qing Wu approached to greet him with a smile.

But Su Yi couldn’t be bothered with pleasantries. He said directly, “Where is the Fuyou Boat?”

As he spoke, he snapped his fingers, and an invisible restriction silently enveloped him and Qing Wu on all sides, blocking off all other sounds in the restaurant.

This also prevented others from eavesdropping.

Qing Wu took a seat in front of Su Yi, then passed him a jade slip. “Over...
